cast.overview: The story of Tim Ballard, a former US government agent, who quits his job in order to devote his life to rescuing children from global sex traffickers.
cast.title: Sound of Freedom

details.biography:
Born in Santiago de Cali (Colombia).

His passion for acting began at an early age, participating in plays at school, hence his taste for playwriting.

When he was 18 years old, he joined Gravi Estudios as an assistant set designer, where he was offered a character in "Sombra de tu Sombra" a soap opera of Caracol TV.  He decided to improve his acting technique and began his training by entering the academy Charlot of Master Jaime Botero in Bogota, complementing with workshops in acting techniques for Film and TV. making his debut in the Cinema in 2010 in "petecuy La Pelicula".
details.name: Hector Lucumi
